languages.text: Убедил{mf||а} гладиаторов на арене сражаться сообща против богомерзких ксеносов.
Convinced the gladiators in the arena to fight together against the accursed xenos.
languages.original_text: Убедил{mf||а} гладиаторов на арене сражаться сообща против богомерзких ксеносов.

traits.locale_text: Convinced the gladiators in the arena to fight together against the accursed xenos.
Convinced the gladiators in the arena to fight together against the accursed xenos.
Convinced the gladiators in the arena to fight together against the accursed xenos.
Convinced the gladiators in the arena to fight together against the accursed xenos.

languages.text: アリーナのグラディエーターどもを、『忌まわしいゼノス』相手に手を組んで戦うよう説得した。
languages.original_text: Convinced the gladiators in the arena to fight together against the accursed xenos.

traits.locale_text: アリーナのグラディエーターどもを、『忌まわしいゼノス』相手に手を組んで戦うよう説得した。

languages.text: Convenciste a los gladiadores de la arena para luchar juntos contra los sacrílegos xenos.
languages.original_text: Convinced the gladiators in the arena to fight together against the accursed xenos.

traits.locale_text: Convenciste a los gladiadores de la arena para luchar juntos contra los sacrílegos xenos.

languages.text: 你说服了竞技场里的角斗士们，让所有人齐心协力对抗邪恶的异形。
languages.original_text: Convinced the gladiators in the arena to fight together against the accursed xenos.

traits.locale_text: 你说服了竞技场里的角斗士们，让所有人齐心协力对抗邪恶的异形。

languages.text: Die Gladiatoren in der Arena überzeugt, gemeinsam gegen den verfluchten Xenos zu kämpfen.
languages.original_text: Convinced the gladiators in the arena to fight together against the accursed xenos.

traits.locale_text: Die Gladiatoren in der Arena überzeugt, gemeinsam gegen den verfluchten Xenos zu kämpfen.

languages.text: Vous avez convaincu les gladiateurs dans l'arène de faire équipe pour combattre l'engeance xénos maudite.
languages.original_text: Convinced the gladiators in the arena to fight together against the accursed xenos.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez convaincu les gladiateurs dans l'arène de faire équipe pour combattre l'engeance xénos maudite.

languages.text: Arenadaki gladyatörleri, uğursuz zenolara karşı birlikte savaşmaya ikna ettin.
languages.original_text: Convinced the gladiators in the arena to fight together against the accursed xenos.

traits.locale_text: Arenadaki gladyatörleri, uğursuz zenolara karşı birlikte savaşmaya ikna ettin.
